long_description: The simplified handling of the Petzl LIM'ICE Ice Screw Sharpener makes drill sharpening fast and easy. The 2 sharpening guides optimize precision sharpening on both sides of the drill teeth. Easy handling of the device makes for quick and easy sharpening. 2 sharpening guieds allow precise sharpening of both sides of the drill teeth. Standard sharpening guides allow sharpening of most ice screws. Petzl LIM'ICE Ice Screw Sharpener has a high-quality file that is reversible for extended life.
short_description: The simplified handling of the Petzl LIM'ICE Ice Screw Sharpener makes drill sharpening fast and easy. The 2 sharpening guides optimize precision sharpening on both sides of the drill teeth.
